title: Iceland Experiments With A Jubilee Of Debt Forgiveness
teaser: A jubilee is an idea that dates back to Biblical times. The idea was that every 50 years or so there would be this moment where debts would be forgiven. The jubilee has not gotten a lot of traction in the modern world, but right now, Iceland is actually trying it.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
